title: Cherry Goo and Max's Naughty Adventure: Book 3
description: All tales are separate stand alone episodes, but best when read in orderCherry, who never loses control, tries to blame a momentary slip between her and personal assistant Max on to many wine coolers and a bad experience with one of her male groupies.Now things may be changed forever.Especially since Cherry, who was contemplating firing Max, suddenly finds herself jealous when he attends her male backup band's groupie party notorious for its three to one female to male orgies.Adult situations and language. Over 18 only
author: Savvy Love
